scenario_text.value: MIU! ARE YOU OKAY?!
ANSWER ME!
There’s no sign of Miu anywhere.
Oh no... It’s more of them...
Hey! You over there!
Eek!
Don’t be scared, Biyomon. I’m right here.
Oh, phew... You guys really scared me!
Where’s Miu? What happened to your queen?!
Uh, the queen is in hiding.
You mean she escaped?
That’s right! She took off real quick!

Yeah, that sounds like her. She always has
been good at running away.
Well, I’m glad to hear it. I hope she’s okay.

For what must’ve been a snap decision, it
sounds like she made the right choice.
Yet we still cannot be sure of her safety.
That’s true...

There’s no telling how long she’ll be okay.
I’ve gotta look out for her!

Well, she might be fast, but she’s still
a kid. She can’t have gone that far.
So do we search the park again?

We’ll have to. It’ll be tough with all the
enemies, but we gotta split up and find her.

Under the circumstances, I don’t see any
other option.

Yeah, if they catch her, it won’t be so easy
for her to escape again.

Leave this to me! I’ve got every inch of this
place memorized!

Let’s go find <color=#B41919>Miu</color> before the kidnappers get
her!
I... I’ll find some way to help too!

Haru, Miyuki, we’ll need you two to help out
again. Are you both okay with that?
Yeah, we’ll help.
Help...

If it starts to get dangerous, me and Takuma
will protect you!
Thanks, Agumon!
All right, everybody, let’s go!
